#Loading of R packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(sf,tidyverse, tmap,ggstatsplot)
```
:::


#Loading of geographical data into R, and rewriting the file to kml format


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP", 
                  layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\dewschan\ISSS622-GAA\In_class_Ex\In_Class_Ex01\data\Geospatial\MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundaryWebSHP' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
st_write(mpsz_shp , "data/geospatial/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundary.kml",
         delete_dsn = TRUE )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Deleting source `data/geospatial/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundary.kml' using driver `KML'
Writing layer `MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundary' to data source 
  `data/geospatial/MasterPlan2014SubzoneBoundary.kml' using driver `KML'
Writing 323 features with 15 fields and geometry type Multi Polygon.
```


:::
:::


#Importing the data to and compare the diffences between the shapefile or kml file format.

#If the data useing


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_2019_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/MPSZ-2019", 
                  layer = "MPSZ-2019")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MPSZ-2019' from data source 
  `C:\dewschan\ISSS622-GAA\In_class_Ex\In_Class_Ex01\data\Geospatial\MPSZ-2019' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 6 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_2019_kml <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `URA_MP19_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL' from data source 
  `C:\dewschan\ISSS622-GAA\In_class_Ex\In_Class_Ex01\data\Geospatial\MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml' 
  using driver `KML'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY, XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::


#Importing data plus transformation of to the projection coordination system


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_2019_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial/MPSZ-2019", 
                  layer = "MPSZ-2019") %>%
    st_transform( crs = 3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MPSZ-2019' from data source 
  `C:\dewschan\ISSS622-GAA\In_class_Ex\In_Class_Ex01\data\Geospatial\MPSZ-2019' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
```
